document_data.mainbody:
edCirannis was a drow male who became a cultist of the Absolute in the late 15 century DR.
In the , NedCirannis was initiated to the Cult of the Absolute in the Moonrise Towers. He became part of the goblin and drow army under the command of Minthara Baenre that targeted the Emerald Grove in the Western Heartlands. He was scouting the grove but was caught off guard and killed by a druid in the form of a bear. Subsequently, his body was taken to Archdruid Halsin and Netties story to be dissected. In the process, the druid discovered that NedCirannis was infected by a mind flayer tadpole.
